article.articleText: All content pages feature the optional hover scroll, which this page uses. The background width & height is editable right from XML. The background opacity has been set to 0 from XML. The width, height, x, and y for each of these html text blocks have been set from XML, and font has been styled by the external style sheet content.css. The font-family, font-size, color, leading, and any other .css property that flash recognizes can all be set from this style sheet. The page's top margin, bottom margin, X alignment, and Y alignment has also been set from XML. You can also choose to link your images to 10 different pop-ups or internal/external links that have been outlined in layout 2 under the content tab.
